data.event: Hampton Post Office opened on 19 May 1913 (a receiving office had been open from 1887) and closed in 1977.
Hampton Post Office opened on 19 May 1913 (a receiving office had been open from 1887) and closed in 1977.

event.title: 1886, the Crows Nest railway line reached

data.event: In 1886, the Crows Nest railway line reached the town.
